description:
This is the 10 BILLIONTH downloaded app Paper Glider!!

Get the global no.1 game smash hit with over 4.5 million downloads! Now available as a universal app for iPhone and iPad.

How far can you flick and fly your paper plane? Use your finger to swipe the plane, fly over the wall and out of the garden.

You need to tap the screen in little bursts to give your plane a wind boost to make it fly around the world! Judge carefully how much to boost as you only have a limited amount. Plus you must avoid crashing...

SUPER BOOST MODE
Flick & fly further than every before in the new SUPER BOOST mode!

Earn or buy coins to equip your Paper Glider with boosts so you can fly around the world & beyond! 

Rocket Boost - Propel your Paper Glider through the sky!
Mega Boost - Shoot to space with this powerful boost!
Refill Wind - Glide the extra distance with this replenishing boost!
Emergency Boost - Use when plummeting, a total game-saver!

CUSTOMISE YOUR PAPER GLIDER
* Flag planes for USA, UK, Germany, Australia, Germany, France, Italy and Japan.
* Plus Flame Glider, Pink Heart Glider and Army Glider

Includes:
- iPhone 4 Retina Display
- Game Center!
- Hours of addictive fun!

An update to fix the bug discovered on 3G devices is on the way!

* Please note: New Super Boost game mode is not yet available on iPad *

Follow us for tips, friends, updates & the latest news!
www.facebook.com/paperglider
www.twitter.com/paperglider
